title: Her Ex Is Ruining Her Reputation With Her With Her Friends!
description:
After five years of dating, our listener broke up with her boyfriend for the sake of her mental health. However, her ex didn't take the break-up well and has been trashing her name ever since. 
It's so bad that her friends are questioning her character. So what can she do to put an end to this? 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
